column3: Latest;According to a tweet from World Wide Fund for Nature
column4: camera traps in ------#WWF------’s supported Sambor Wildlife Sanctuary in northeast Cambodia have captured images of four ------Eld’s deers------ (Rucervus eldii *maybe ------siamensis------) for the first time in five years.------The discovery raises hopes for the conservation of the species in the country and region.
